Overit:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local ServerStorage = game:GetService("ServerStorage")

local buffValue = 2

local function getInfoStatsBuffs(unit: Model)
	local info = unit:FindFirstChild("Info")
	local stats = info and info:FindFirstChild("Stats")
	local buffs = info and info:FindFirstChild("Buffs")
	return info, stats, buffs
end

return {
	CanUse = true,

	Class = "Card",	
	Rarity = "Epic",
	Description = "Every 10 attacks, this unit gains +25% Damage for 15 seconds.",

	Card = {
		MaxPerUnit = 1,
		SlotCount = 2,
		Passives = {
			OnSpawn = function(ThisUnit)
				if not RunService:IsServer() then return end
				if not ThisUnit or not ThisUnit.Parent then return end
				
				ThisUnit:SetAttribute("OverchargeAttackCount", 0)
			end,
			
			OnAttack = function(Player, ThisUnit)
				if not RunService:IsServer() then return end
				if not ThisUnit or not ThisUnit.Parent then return end
				
				local Methods = require(ServerStorage.Server.Utility.Methods)
				
				local SpeedLibrary = require(ReplicatedStorage.Shared.Core.Speed)
				local TaskLibrary = SpeedLibrary.TaskLibrary 
				
				local _, stats, buffs = getInfoStatsBuffs(ThisUnit)
				if not stats or not buffs then
					return
				end
				
				local dmgBuff = buffs:FindFirstChild("Damage")
				if not dmgBuff then
					dmgBuff = Instance.new("NumberValue")
					dmgBuff.Name = "Damage"
					dmgBuff.Value = 0
					dmgBuff.Parent = buffs
				end
				
				local AttackCount = ThisUnit:GetAttribute("OverchargeAttackCount")
				if AttackCount then
					if AttackCount == 10 then
						ThisUnit:SetAttribute("OverchargeAttackCount", 0)
						
						dmgBuff.Value += buffValue / 100
						Methods.RecalculateStats(ThisUnit)
						
						TaskLibrary.wait(15)
						
						dmgBuff.Value -= buffValue / 100
					end
				else
					ThisUnit:SetAttribute("OverchargeAttackCount", AttackCount + 1)
				end
			end,
		},
		Type = "Typeless",
		Upgrade = "Overyou",
		SetBonus = {
			[1] = {
				Type = "Art",
				Amount = 2,
				Stats = {
					SPA = -5, 
				},
			},
			[2]= {
				Type = "Star",
				Amount = 2,
				Stats = {
					Damage = 10, 
				},
			}
		},
		SetBonusDescription = "2 Art: -5% SPA\n2 Star: +10% Damage",
	},

	Offset = CFrame.new(-5, -5, 20), 
	Rotation = CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(0), 0) 
}

Drawnup:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local ServerStorage = game:GetService("ServerStorage")

local DMG_BUFF = 50

local function getInfoStatsBuffs(unit: Model)
	local info = unit:FindFirstChild("Info")
	local stats = info and info:FindFirstChild("Stats")
	local buffs = info and info:FindFirstChild("Buffs")
	return info, stats, buffs
end

return {
	CanUse = true,

	Class = "Card",	
	Rarity = "Rare",
	Description = "For every unit not recieving a damage buff in this unit's range, this unit gains +50% Damage.",

	Card = {
		MaxPerUnit = 1,
		SlotCount = 1,
		Passives = {
			OnSpawn = function(ThisUnit)
				if not RunService:IsServer() then return end
				if not ThisUnit or not ThisUnit.Parent then return end
				
				local Methods = require(ServerStorage.Server.Utility.Methods)

				local SpeedLibrary = require(ReplicatedStorage.Shared.Core.Speed)
				local TaskLibrary = SpeedLibrary.TaskLibrary 

				local _, stats, buffs = getInfoStatsBuffs(ThisUnit)
				if not stats or not buffs then
					return
				end
				
				local dmgBuff = buffs:FindFirstChild("Damage")
				if not dmgBuff then
					dmgBuff = Instance.new("NumberValue")
					dmgBuff.Name = "Damage"
					dmgBuff.Value = 0
					dmgBuff.Parent = buffs
				end
				
				local rng = stats:FindFirstChild("Range")
				local r = rng.Value
				
				local myPos = ThisUnit:GetPivot().Position
				
				local lastApplied = 0
				
				task.spawn(function()				
					while ThisUnit and ThisUnit.Parent do
						local count = 0
						
						for _, other in ipairs(workspace.Units:GetChildren()) do
							if other ~= ThisUnit and other.Parent then
								if not other.Info.Buffs:FindFirstChild("Damage") or other.Info.Buffs:FindFirstChild("Damage") == 0 then
									print("!")
									local dist = (myPos - other:GetPivot().Position).Magnitude
									if dist <= r then
										count += 1
									end
								end
							end
						end
						
						local desired = (count * DMG_BUFF) / 100

						if desired ~= lastApplied then
							dmgBuff.Value -= lastApplied
							dmgBuff.Value += desired
							lastApplied = desired
							Methods.RecalculateStats(ThisUnit)
						end
						
						task.wait(0.1)
					end
				end)
			end,
		},
		Type = "Art",
	},

	Offset = CFrame.new(-5, -5, 20), 
	Rotation = CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(0), 0) 
}

Overme:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local ServerStorage = game:GetService("ServerStorage")

local buffValue = 55

local function getInfoStatsBuffs(unit: Model)
	local info = unit:FindFirstChild("Info")
	local stats = info and info:FindFirstChild("Stats")
	local buffs = info and info:FindFirstChild("Buffs")
	return info, stats, buffs
end

return {
	CanUse = true,

	Class = "Card",	
	Rarity = "Mythic",
	Description = "Every 10 attacks, this unit gains +55% Damage for 15 seconds.",

	Card = {
		MaxPerUnit = 1,
		SlotCount = 2,
		Passives = {
			OnSpawn = function(ThisUnit)
				if not RunService:IsServer() then return end
				if not ThisUnit or not ThisUnit.Parent then return end
				
				ThisUnit:SetAttribute("OverchargeAttackCount", 0)
			end,
			
			OnAttack = function(Player, ThisUnit)
				if not RunService:IsServer() then return end
				if not ThisUnit or not ThisUnit.Parent then return end
				
				local Methods = require(ServerStorage.Server.Utility.Methods)
				
				local SpeedLibrary = require(ReplicatedStorage.Shared.Core.Speed)
				local TaskLibrary = SpeedLibrary.TaskLibrary 
				
				local _, stats, buffs = getInfoStatsBuffs(ThisUnit)
				if not stats or not buffs then
					return
				end
				
				local dmgBuff = buffs:FindFirstChild("Damage")
				if not dmgBuff then
					dmgBuff = Instance.new("NumberValue")
					dmgBuff.Name = "Damage"
					dmgBuff.Value = 0
					dmgBuff.Parent = buffs
				end
				
				local AttackCount = ThisUnit:GetAttribute("OverchargeAttackCount")
				if AttackCount then
					if AttackCount == 10 then
						ThisUnit:SetAttribute("OverchargeAttackCount", 0)
						
						dmgBuff.Value += buffValue / 100
						Methods.RecalculateStats(ThisUnit)
						
						TaskLibrary.wait(15)
						
						dmgBuff.Value -= buffValue / 100
					else
						ThisUnit:SetAttribute("OverchargeAttackCount", AttackCount + 1)
					end
				end
			end,
		},
		Type = "Typeless",
		SetBonus = {
			[1] = {
				Type = "Art",
				Amount = 2,
				Stats = {
					SPA = -15, 
				},
			},
			[2]= {
				Type = "Star",
				Amount = 2,
				Stats = {
					Damage = 30, 
				},
			}
		},
		SetBonusDescription = "2 Art: -15% SPA\n2 Star: +30% Damage",
	},

	Offset = CFrame.new(-5, -5, 20), 
	Rotation = CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(0), 0) 
}
